titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
1936 LORD Mrs Eda Lord 7 rue Beethoven 16e
3 mos 1 v 65 dep 50
March 21 Flowering Judas. Ap. 7. Took copy from window Ap 7. Lectures in America. April 22 22 Altogether July 3 Renewed. June 22 - December 22 1936 100fr. July 3 Powys Brothers. 10 10 Winner Take Nothing 15 Destructive Element 30 (no extra charge) 15. Weather in the Street 30 30. Eyeless in Gaza. 7. Burning Cactus (50c a day) Aug 7 Aug 7 Cosmopolitans Sept 4 Case is Altered 4 Thinking Reed 4 White Horses of Vienna 4 Sept 4. Inhale + Exhale_ 10 Epitaph on George Moore. 10 Interrupted Sept 10 3 mths 12 days. ref. Renewed Nov 30 - March 12. 1937. Nov 30 Surrealism sent p.c. Dec 30. Jan 9. pd 4.50 Jan 9. Nightwood Jan. 14 Jan 14 Stories of Three Decades (pd 11v) Feb 15 Feb 15 Monogram Mar. 6
Mar. 6. Kit Brandon (1.25v a day) 20 6 Behind the Spanish Barricades 20 sent pc. Mar 27. Renewed March 12 - Sept 12 1937 100v March 20 Theatre (may keep a few days extra) March 24 24 Present Indicative April 2. April 2 365 days_ April 5. April 5. Delicate Monster. 50c. a day. April 8 5. Paradoxes of Mr Pond April 8 April 8 Autobiography (Chesterton) May 7 sent pc May. 7. 40c. Renewed May 19. -Sept. 25. May 19. Years. May 27 17 As I was going down Sackville June 27 is there a fine? 1 month! had book out 3 weeks overdue. Subscription interrupted June 27 April 1st started again - goes to June 1st new book subsc 1v April 1st Trial of a Judge April 11 Dead Centre 2v a day " " April 11 Pavements at Anderby " 14 11 Sally Bowles (extra) April 14 14 First Lover May 3 14 Longest Journey May 3 May 4 Lions and Shadows May 25
